comment.author: 50491110@N00
comment._content: I love the hats; and I appreciate what they did for all of us women.

comment.author: 26230561@N03
comment._content: It was a long process, but it took many bold and courageous women to get to where we are today.  I still believe it is a battle for women to uphold their integrity and strive for equality.
